name: Neoverse Trinity Edition
storyline:
Humanity had become so technologically advanced that, driven by curiosity, they began to venture into space and time in search of new worlds, which eventually brought about the discovery of the multiverse, a discovery that would lead to the collapse of space and time, creating the NEOVERSE.

In this new category of universe, other worlds began to overlap with our own, here realities and time stretch and meld into one singular essence.

And now three heroines with the power to save the NEOVERSE have appeared.
summary: NEOVERSE is a time-warping multiverse game consisting of thrilling adventures that are packed with great and exciting challenges; combining rogue-lite, deck building, strategy gameplay all in one. It puts your skills to the test. Set off on an adventure with unique heroes to save the living realms regardless of time and space.
